content.content: Women die from sepsis during pregnancy, childbirth and after delivery. 12.8% of pregnancy-related deaths are from sepsis in the US.[^123] Embedded content: https://youtu.be/7XTpekEpwmc Embedded content: https://youtu.be/ctYDm9H1kqI ### Risk Factors: - Cesarean section - Preterm delivery - Postpartum hemorrhage - Placenta retention after birth - Multiple births (like twins or triplets) - Mastitis (breast infection) - Chronic illness (like diabetes) - Miscarriage - Abortion - Invasive tests [^124] ### Prevention: - Routine vaccinations - Healthcare providers washing their hands - Knowing the signs of infection (fever, foul-smelling discharge, redness, pain, &/or bleeding) - Follow instructions for vaginal care &/or surgical incision care - Wash your hands before vaginal care &/or surgical incision care[^124] __Use the Hospital Plan of Care form to advocate and ask questions about your loved one.__ [The Hospital Plan of Care form](https://patientsafetymovement.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/POC-Blank-April-19.pdf "The Hospital Plan of Care form") [Guide to Medical Care at a Distance](https://patientsafetymovement.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Guide-to-Medical-Care-at-a-Distance.pdf "Guide to Medical Care at a Distance") [Sepsis and Pregnancy & Childbirth from the Sepsis Alliance](https://www.sepsis.org/sepsis-and/pregnancy-and-childbirth/) ## Post-Sepsis Syndrome (PSS) Embedded content: https://youtu.be/HIk64wdy44Q __Fifty percent (50%) of Sepsis survivors suffer from Post-Sepsis Syndrome.__[^87] ### New Physical Challenges: - Fatigue and weakness - Muscle &/or joint pain - Amputation - Increased risk for infection - Shortness of breath - Dressing, grooming, walking, & feeding difficulties[^87],[^88] ### New Mental Issues: - Depression, anxiety, &/or PTSD (Post-traumatic stress syndrome) - Poor memory or slow thinking - Difficulty concentrating - Difficulty sleeping, nightmares, &/or insomnia - Panic attacks - Hallucinations[^87][^88] ### Prevention: - Early mobilization - [ICU Diary](http://www.icu-diary.org/diary/Diary.html "ICU Diary") - Family/Caregiver support and engagement[^89][^90] ### Treatments & Support: - Physical, Occupational, &/or Speech therapy - Psychological therapy, counseling, &/or neuropsychological testing - Follow up health care provider &/or specialist appointments - Medication review & education by health care provider[^89][^90] [After the ICU](https://www.sccm.org/MyICUCare/THRIVE "After the ICU") [Post-Intensive Care Syndrome](https://www.sccm.org/MyICUCare/THRIVE/Post-intensive-Care-Syndrome "Post-Intensive Care Syndrome") [^87]: Sepsis Alliance. Post-Sepsis Syndrome. Accessed March 8, 2020. [https://www.sepsis.org/sepsis-basics/post-sepsis-syndrome/](https://www.sepsis.org/sepsis-basics/post-sepsis-syndrome/) [^88]: Prescott HC, Angus DC. Postsepsis morbidity. *JAMA.* 2018;319(1):91. doi:10.1001/jama.2017.19809.[https://jamanetwork.com/journals/jama/fullarticle/2667724](https://jamanetwork.com/journals/jama/fullarticle/2667724) Accessed March 8, 2020." [^89]: Parker AM, Sricharoenchai T, & Needham DM. Early rehabilitation in the intensive care unit: Preventing impairment of physical and mental health. Curr Phys Med Rehabil Rep 1, 307–314 (2013). Accessed April 10, 2020. https://doi.org/10.1007/s40141-013-0027-9. [^90]: Davidson JE, Aslakson RA, Long AC, Puntillo KA, Kross EK, Hart J, et al. . Guidelines for family-centered care in the neonatal, pediatric, and adult ICU. Crit Care Med. (2017) 45:103–28. doi.org/10.1097/CCM.0000000000002169. Accessed April 10, 2020. [^123]: Centers for Disease Control & Prevention (CDC). Reproductive Health. Pregnancy Mortality Surveillance System. CDC Website. https://www.cdc.gov/reproductivehealth/maternalinfanthealth/pregnancy-mortality-surveillance-system.htm. Updated August 7, 2018. Accessed September 27, 2018. [^124]: Sepsis Alliance. Sepsis and Pregnancy & Childbirth. Sepsis Alliance website. https://www.sepsis.org/sepsis-and/pregnancy-and-childbirth/. Updated December 14, 2017. Accessed September 27, 2018.
